content: Sad to see you leave London but hopefully the lean course that UAM asked you to teach will bring in more people :-)

Thanks! The course is at UCM (as part of their PhD program in Mathematical Research), but it is open to people from other universities. In case anyone from the Madrid are is interested, here is the course info (there is also an online option).

Hola!

I am currently working at Complutense. @María Inés de Frutos Fernández : I had seen the announcement of your course last year but unfortunately it overlapped with my teaching. Maybe we'll have some chance to meet in the future.
Hola a todos -- I'll be in Madrid on Monday for 10 days or so. If there's any Lean-related things happening or if anyone's keen to get a coffee would love to meet up!
